Ktrain

```{r}

```


Question 18 
```{r}

k2=apply(Ktrain,1,sum) 
k3=apply(Ktrain ,2,sum) 
k4=sum(Ktrain) 
KtrainCent=matrix(0,ncol=n,nrow=n) 
for (i in 1:n)
{
  for (j in 1:n) {
    KtrainCent[i,j]=Ktrain[i,j]-1/n*k2[i]-1/n*k3[j]+1/n^2*k4 
  }
}
```




Question 19 
```{r}

```
